name: LoveArena
description:
overview

I made this game to be a casual party game, so it's almost all auto-aim!! You can usually hit a bullet by aligning it!!!
Respawn is fast!!! There is no health recovery, so the more you attack, the more you win!!!!
Use your abilities and skills to win!!!
There are two game modes: Deathmatch and Team Domination!!!

ouch!!

You Can Feel the Damage Directly Using Lovense!!
(See the in-game manual for instructions on how to connect)

avatars

You can play with your avatar or your favorite avatar created by you using VRoidHub!!
(Depending on avatar's public settings, you may not be able to use it.)

gamepad

Menu Operation Is Limited to Keyboard & Mouse.
You Can Also Use Only the Gamepad During A Match.

demo Version

This is for operation check only.
Only "Private Match" for one person is available.
Please use it to check if there are any problems with the operation, VRoidHub integration, Lovense integration, etc.

service

This Game Is Developed By One Person.
Due to server maintenance costs and other reasons, I'm not planning a long-term operation, and the service will be in operation for a maximum of one year after launch.
I will notify you one month prior to the end of the service.

to streamers

For live streaming and video submissions using this game.
Individuals, corporations, with or without revenue are allowed.
However, please include the title of the game and a link to the Steam store page.
For platforms that restrict the inclusion of links, please mention "Steam LoveArena".
